attributes.action: arrange to give the elderly free train travel in addition to free bus travel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If you live in Greater London and are over 60 you get a free bus, free rail and free tube pass within that area.
Why offer such a privilege to only a few that way? All elderly citizens need the freedom to travel by train as well as by bus.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
